meanings.sent1: He refrains from eating sweets to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: She refrains from interrupting others while they speak.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy refrains from chewing on the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The driver refrains from pressing the accelerator on the icy road.
meanings.sent5: The doctor advises her patient to refrain from smoking for better recovery.

meanings.definition: A repeated line or verse in a song or poem.
meanings.sent1: The refrain in the song was catchy and easy to remember.
meanings.sent2: The poet included a beautiful refrain in his latest poem.
meanings.sent3: The refrain of the song got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: The refrain of the poem echoed through the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The refrain added a rhythmic touch to the song.

meanings.definition: A phrase or verse repeated at intervals in a song or poem.
meanings.sent1: The emotional refrain in the song brought tears to her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The refrain of the poem emphasized the central theme.
meanings.sent3: The repetitive refrain in the song made it easy to sing along.
meanings.sent4: The haunting refrain in the poem lingered in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The melodic refrain enhanced the beauty of the composition.
